meanings.sent1: I will reship the package tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: The company reshipped the damaged items for free.
meanings.sent3: After realizing the mistake, they had to reship the order with the correct address.
meanings.sent4: She reshipped her love and care to her distant friend through a heartfelt letter.
meanings.sent5: The idea of reshipping the lost treasure brought a glimmer of hope to the adventurers.

meanings.definition: The act of shipping goods again.
meanings.sent1: The reshipping of the products was necessary due to the error in the first shipment.
meanings.sent2: We offer reshipping services for damaged goods.
meanings.sent3: The reshipping process was delayed due to the stormy weather.
meanings.sent4: The reshipping of memories through old photographs brought back nostalgic feelings.
meanings.sent5: The reshipping of the rare artifact was done with utmost care to ensure its safety.
